text: aur jab tumhaare paas ve log aaen, jo hamaaree aayaton ko maanate hai, to kaho, "salaam ho tumapar! tumhaare rab ne dayaaluta ko apane oopar anivaary kar liya hai ki tumamen se jo koee naasamajhee se koee buraee kar baithe, phir usake baad palat aae aur apana sudhaar kar to yah hai vah bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai.
